entity.name: Arctos Alliance
entity.description: Arctos Alliance exists to ensure the long-term sustainability of Apache Arrow and Apache Parquet open-source projects. We fund ongoing development of critical data infrastructure while keeping these projects neutral and independent. Our mission is to support engineers and researchers in analytics, machine learning, and high-performance computing through community-driven development.

projects.name: Arctos Alliance
projects.description: Organization dedicated to sustaining Apache Arrow and Apache Parquet projects through independent funding and governance

channels.description: Open Collective funding platform for transparent community funding

plans.name: Partner
plans.description: Organizational partner tier with logo placement and advisory input

plans.name: Champion
plans.description: Champion tier with enhanced benefits and governance participation

plans.name: Strategic Sponsor
plans.description: Strategic sponsor tier with significant governance influence

plans.name: Sustaining Sponsor
